About Me

Let me tell you a little about myself and what I do...

Your Project Is In Safe Hands

A fully self learned passionate front-end web developer with a year of experience using HTML5, CSS and JavaScript to build all aspects of the user experience and user interface for client-facing landing pages. Be assured that you will have your projects completed with full excellency meeting your deadlines as promised.

Completed six months of long Front-End Web Development courses on Udemy and Coursera.

3 Months Internship

Joined a startup company and worked as a intern for 3 months.
